name: Casper (itch)
description:
You are Casper, exploring a quiet, Japanese-inspired neighbourhood at dusk. As an inquisitive cat armed with nothing more than your paws, uncover the mysteries that the world has to show you from this unique perspective and begin to piece together the special bond that Casper once shared.

Created by:
Ben Argall - @benargall
Sophie Fyfe - @fyfefighter
Julia Ye - @JYISCOOL12
Sarah Carlton - @SarahYC17

Controls:
W|A|S|D - move
Right/left click - interact
Esc - pause game

NOTE:
For Mac users, you may need to allow permissions from unknown developers in your System Preferences. This can be found in Security & Privacy > General.

If your Windows build is struggling to run, a low graphics settings option is available to download, which will hopefully help you out. The Mac version, by default, is built with lower graphics settings.
